oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An incomplete unidentified work on inheritance : manuscript, undated
Urjūzah fī al-farāʼiḍ wa-sharḥuhā
Risālah fī al-farāʼiḍ
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه الاعانة فصل اعلم ان الناظم لم يتعرض. :Incipit
Written surface: 13.2 x 16.3 cm; 17 – 20 lines per page, in clear naskhi script in black ink, on beige paper, with headings, keywords, and markings in red.

It is meant as an emendation to another urjuzah (poem), but the latter is not mentioned here. The present poem specifically deals with the inheritance of relative on the mother's side, who were neglected in the original poem.
Part of a longer work; incomplete at the end.
Undated but most likely from the nineteenth century.
MS Arab 430. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ارجوزة في الفرائض وشرحها
رسالة في الفرائض
